Title: Relates to adding two trustees to the power authority to represent Niagara county and St. Lawrence county
Summary: Adds two trustees to the power authority to represent Niagara county and St. Lawrence county.
LawCode: Amd ยง1003, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to adding two trustees to the power authority to represent Niagara county and St. Lawrence county
